item.title: Angular Workshop at TUGA IT 2017 in Lisbon
item.description: I am happy to announce my next public Angular workshop, at the http://tugait.pt/2017/. The workshop will take place on May 18th, and it will be a joint workshop about Angular and Xamarin. Get ready for a full day of cross-platform development! For those of you that are …
item.dc:creator: Peter Bouda

item.title: Angular Lisbon Meetup in February
item.description:
It’s Angular Meetup time in Lisbon again! On February 21st we will have an awesome talk by Pedro Esperança about the Angular ng-cli. Pedro will also introduce you to Angular 2 in general, so this talk target beginners and intermediate Angular hackers specifically. Don’t miss it!

https://www …
item.dc:creator: Peter Bouda

item.title: Talk about Angular 2 at LXJS Lisbon
item.description: Next week I will be giving a talk at the LXJS Meetup at Uniplaces in Lisbon, about “Rapid cross-platform development with Angular 2”. I heard there will be a wrestling match at the end of the event, between the React and the Angular supporters. So join in and show your …
item.dc:creator: Peter Bouda

item.title: September Qt Drink-up Lisbon
item.description:
Time for the next Qt Meetup Lisbon, this time it will be a casual meeting in a beautiful location:

http://www.meetup.com/Qt-Meetup-Lisbon/events/225120324/

Taking place September 29th, 19:00, at the Quiosque do Miradouro de Santa Catarina. Join in and meet the trolls of Lisbon!
item.dc:creator: Peter Bouda

item.title: First Qt Meetup Lisbon
item.description: Will you be in Lisbon midth of July and want to learn more about Qt on embedded devices? Then come to the first Qt Meetup Lisbon on July 14th, 19:00h at Startup Campus powered by Banif. I will give a talk about using Buildroot for Embedded Qt development. You …
item.dc:creator: Peter Bouda
